about.title: Hi, i'm Mauro Cubilla
about.description: I'm a web developer from Argentina specialized in frontend with react but i also have knowledge of various backend technologies

projects.title: Recipes Social Network
projects.description: Fullstack proyect where you can share your recipes as well as search for recipes from other users, add them to favourites, leave a comment and rate them. Website protected with password encryption and JWT

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: First React App i developed, using the OpenWeather API to get the weather/forecast and the MapBox search bar to obtain the places and their coordinates.

projects.title: Color ToDo List
projects.description: Classic App to add tasks or events, with the extra of being able to add deadlines which changes color the closer they are.

projects.title: E-Commerce AluraGeek
projects.description: E-Commerce developed as a challenge from the Oracle Next Education program, the design was made following a figma given by those in charge of the program and i used JsonServer for the CRUD.

projects.title: Text Encrypter
projects.description: App that lets you encrypt/decrypt text. Proyect that i made mainly to practice language change and the css tailwind framework.
